title: Breakthrough to literacy
creator_credit: Robin Bates and London, Midland and Scottish Railway
brief_description: Explains the “Breakthrough” method of teaching children to read and write. Useful for parents and teachers and recommended for education discussion groups. Suitable for teachers and tertiary level.
